name: Honkai Player Card
description:
Feel free to make your own card (～￣▽￣)～


The star(s) of equipment(s), rank, and type of battlesuit can easily change by show/hide (group of) layer! Explore the group to see it ( •̀ ω •́ )✧


Edit the "Image" layer to change the image and "Title"/"Content" to change the text. Alright, just copy the image that you want from the link below and replace it~


Copy/Download battlesuit png here.


Copy/Download equipment icon (Search equipment by name and/or class)

  • Weapons
  • Stigmata


You can change the game logo, your name, UID, server, level, slogan, valkyries, photo, equipment(s), and the background by your choice too~


And after finishing your edit, select all and export with the export button in the right column :3


Credit to me if you want to thank~


Images and elements from the official wiki.
